content: Hello! This is XYZ Home Services AI receptionist. May I please have your name to get started with scheduling your electrical service?
Thanks, Mark. Could you please provide the address where you'd like us to provide the electrical service?
Thank you. Let me verify if your address is within our service area.
Great news! Your address is within our service area. When would be your ideal time for our technician to come by?
Uh, I'm not really sure. Can you just send someone soon? I don't have a specific time in mind.
I understand it can be tricky to choose. Could you please give me at least a preferred part of the day, like morning, afternoon, or evening?
I really don’t know. Maybe just whenever you have an opening. Can’t promise anything else.
To proceed with scheduling, I need to know a time window. Since you’re unsure, let me escalate this to a human operator who can assist you more personally. Please hold on.
reason: Unable to gather ideal time from customer
